content.html: Say your domain name is your full name, and you want to setup an email account on that domain. What username do you use? E.g. contact@yourfullname.com firstname@yourfullname.com or...? I used to use contact@sarasoueidan like 10 years ago but I donâ€™t like that anymore. Ideas?
content.value:
Say your domain name is your full name, and you want to setup an email account on that domain. What username do you use?

E.g. 
contact@yourfullname.com
firstname@yourfullname.com
or...? 

I used to use contact@sarasoueidan like 10 years ago but I donâ€™t like that anymore. Ideas?
